reviews.text: Family-operated company offering above- & in-ground pools, along with supplies, service, repairs. 11204 Garland Rd, Dallas, TX 75218

"Great service and they stayed open a bit late to explain everything to me." "We couldn’t be happier with his workmanship and communication on this project." "The guys are super helpful and go the extra mile to satisfy their customers."

Crown Pools sold us the liner for our pool renovation this summer and they referred us to Marcos Coronado to do the installation. We couldn’t be happier with his workmanship and communication on this project. We recommend using Crown Pools & Marcos for all your vinyl pool needs!

I recently bought a new Doughboy Pool from Crown Pools in Dallas and was referred to Marcos Coronado for the installation. The entire experience was outstanding—smooth, efficient, and with results that far exceeded my expectations. Marcos … More Response from the owner 10 months ago We appreciate your business Laney!
